description: Detects the export of a crital Registry key to a file. Author: Oddvar Moe, Sander Wiebing, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Dumping hives for legitimate purpouse i.e. backup or forensic investigation
name: Exports Critical Registry Keys To a File
query: (process.executable:*\\regedit.exe AND process.command_line:*\ \/E\ * AND process.command_line:(*hklm* OR *hkey_local_machine*) AND process.command_line:(*\\system OR *\\sam OR *\\security))
